body:
### Welcome to Project Lorena.
This is a simple and direct frontend to run Mame (mamedev.org) in Linux, Windows and Mac OS X. Where the user has quick access to games information, including pictures, videos, sounds, etc.

![Main Screen](http://linuxinabox.org/lorena/images/lorena.png)

### Authors and Contributors
This project was developed by Alfredo Saldanha Jr. [@junixbr](https://twitter.com/junixbr).
Any idea, suggestion or critical are welcome.
If do you want to contribute, please let me know.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with Lorena? Check out the documentation at (soon) or contact lorena@linuxinabox.org and Iâ€™ll help you sort it out.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: Project Lorena is a Mame frontend.
name: Lorena
